topic: Talking About Yourself (Name, Age, Occupation, Hobbies)
introduction:
In this lesson, we will learn how to introduce yourself and provide basic personal information. We'll cover:

  • Vocabulary: Words and phrases related to name, age, job, and hobbies.
  • Grammar: Basic sentence structures with 'I am', 'My name is', 'I have', and 'I like'.

Grammar Structures:

  • Introducing yourself: 'I am…', 'My name is…'
  • Talking about age: 'I am … years old.'
  • Talking about your job: 'I am a …' / 'I work as a …'
  • Talking about hobbies: 'I like …' / 'I enjoy …' / 'My hobby is …'
presentation:
Let's learn some useful words and phrases for talking about yourself:

Vocabulary:

  • Name – What you are called. ('My name is Sarah.')
  • Age – How old you are. ('I am 20 years old.')
  • Occupation – Your job or profession. ('I am a teacher.')
  • Hobby – An activity you like doing. ('My hobby is reading.')
  • Student – A person who studies. ('I am a student.')
  • Doctor – A person who helps sick people. ('I am a doctor.')
  • Like – To enjoy something. ('I like music.')
  • Enjoy – To take pleasure in something. ('I enjoy playing soccer.')
  • Reading – The activity of reading books. ('I like reading.')
  • Music – Sounds that are pleasant to listen to. ('I like music.')
  • Traveling – Going from one place to another. ('I enjoy traveling.')
  • Cooking – Preparing food. ('I like cooking.')

Example Sentences:

  • 'Hello! My name is John. I am 25 years old. I am a student. I like playing football.'
  • 'I enjoy reading and cooking. My hobby is listening to music.'
conclusion:
In this lesson, we learned:

  • How to introduce yourself using basic structures and vocabulary.
  • Words related to name, age, occupation, and hobbies.
  • Sentence structures using 'I am...', 'I like...', 'My name is...'

Example Dialogue:

A: Hello! My name is Sarah. I am 20 years old. I am a student.
B: Hi Sarah! I am Tom. I am 22 years old. I work as a teacher.
A: Nice to meet you! What do you like to do in your free time?
B: I like reading books and playing football.

Questions to Reinforce:

  • What’s your name?
  • How old are you?
  • What is your job?
  • What do you like to do in your free time?
  • What is your hobby?

Homework:

Write a short paragraph about yourself. Talk about:
- Your name
- Your age
- Your job (if you have one)
- Your hobbies
